languages.text: "Я повредил криосклеп Инцендии, и три года она провела в сознании, слепая и беспомощная. Мои братья и сестры читали над ее темницей молебны, дабы заронить семя веры в прополотую мной почву. Скрыв от Инцендии истину, я стал ее наставником на пути служения Его воле. Так из потомка преступницы и еретички Инцендия стала Его карающей дланью, разящей врагов Империума. Ценой моего злодеяния".

traits.locale_text: "Я повредил крио-склеп Инцендии, где следующие три года она провела в сознании, слепая и беспомощная. Все это время мои братья и сестры читали молебны, дабы заронить семя мудрости святого Друза в прополотую мной почву. Через три года, сочтя, что это семя достаточно проросло, мы вызволили ее из темницы. Скрыв от Инцендии истину о содеянном, я стал ее наставником на пути служения Его воле. Так из потомка преступницы и еретички Инцендия стала Его карающей дланью, разящей врагов Империума".

languages.text: "I sabotaged Incendia's cryo-vault, and she spent three years conscious, blind and helpless. My brothers and sisters recited prayers over her prison, to plant the seed of faith in the soil I had weeded. I hid the truth from Incendia and became her mentor, setting her on a path of service to His will. And that was how Incendia, the offspring of a felonious heretic, became His vengeful hand striking down enemies of the Imperium. At the cost of the evil I had done."
languages.original_text: "Я повредил криосклеп Инцендии, и три года она провела в сознании, слепая и беспомощная. Мои братья и сестры читали над ее темницей молебны, дабы заронить семя веры в прополотую мной почву. Скрыв от Инцендии истину, я стал ее наставником на пути служения Его воле. Так из потомка преступницы и еретички Инцендия стала Его карающей дланью, разящей врагов Империума. Ценой моего злодеяния".

traits.locale_text: "I sabotaged Incendia's cryo-vault, and she was awake for three years, blind and helpless. My brothers and sisters recited prayers over her prison, to plant the seed of faith in the soil I had weeded. I hid the truth from Incendia and became her mentor, setting her on a path of service to His will. And that was how Incendia, the offspring of a felonious heretic, became His vengeful hand striking down enemies of the Imperium. At the cost of the evil I had done."

languages.text: “我破坏了因森蒂娅的冷冻舱，让她在清醒、失明、无助的状态下度过了三年的时光。我的兄弟姐妹们在她的牢狱中为她祈祷，在我净化过的土壤中播下了信仰的种子。我对因森蒂娅隐瞒了实情，成为了她的导师，让她踏上了履行神皇意志的道路。就这样，犯下重罪的异端分子的后人，因森蒂娅，成为了神皇的复仇之手，打击帝国的敌人。而我为这样的道路，付出了罪恶的代价。”
languages.original_text: "I sabotaged Incendia's cryo-vault, and she spent three years conscious, blind and helpless. My brothers and sisters recited prayers over her prison, to plant the seed of faith in the soil I had weeded. I hid the truth from Incendia and became her mentor, setting her on a path of service to His will. And that was how Incendia, the offspring of a felonious heretic, became His vengeful hand striking down enemies of the Imperium. At the cost of the evil I had done."

traits.locale_text: “我破坏了因森蒂娅的冷冻舱，让她在清醒、失明、无助的状态下度过了三年的时光。我的兄弟姐妹们在她的牢狱中为她祈祷，在我净化过的土壤中播下了信仰的种子。我对因森蒂娅隐瞒了实情，成为了她的导师，让她踏上了履行神皇意志的道路。就这样，犯下重罪的异端分子的后人，因森蒂娅，成为了神皇的复仇之手，打击帝国的敌人。而我为这样的道路，付出了罪恶的代价。”

languages.text: 「私はインセンディアの冷凍保管庫を破壊した。結果、彼女は3年間、意識がある中目が見えず、無力だった。兄弟や姉妹は彼女の獄中で祈りを唱える事で、私が雑草を取った土に信仰の種を植え付けた。インセンディアには真実を隠し続け、私は彼女の指導者になった。主に仕える存在としての、道を歩むように。こうして重罪異端者の子孫であるインセンディアが、主の帝国の為敵を復讐する存在になったのだ。全て私が仕掛けた悪事の影響でな」
languages.original_text: "I sabotaged Incendia's cryo-vault, and she spent three years conscious, blind and helpless. My brothers and sisters recited prayers over her prison, to plant the seed of faith in the soil I had weeded. I hid the truth from Incendia and became her mentor, setting her on a path of service to His will. And that was how Incendia, the offspring of a felonious heretic, became His vengeful hand striking down enemies of the Imperium. At the cost of the evil I had done."

traits.locale_text: 「私はインセンディアの冷凍保管庫を破壊した。結果、彼女は3年間、意識がある中目が見えず、無力だった。兄弟や姉妹は彼女の獄中で祈りを唱える事で、私が雑草を取った土に信仰の種を植え付けた。インセンディアには真実を隠し続け、私は彼女の指導者になった。主に仕える存在としての、道を歩むように。こうして重罪異端者の子孫であるインセンディアが、主の帝国の為敵を復讐する存在になったのだ。全て私が仕掛けた悪事の影響でな」

languages.text: «Saboteé la criocámara de Incendia y pasó tres años consciente, ciega e indefensa. Mis hermanos y hermanas oraron sobre su prisión para plantar la semilla de la fe en el suelo que yo había desherbado. Le oculté la verdad a Incendia y me convertí en su mentor, encaminándola por el camino del servicio a Su voluntad, y así fue como Incendia, hija de un hereje criminal, se convirtió en Su mano vengativa contra los enemigos del Imperium. A costa del mal que yo había hecho».
languages.original_text: "I sabotaged Incendia's cryo-vault, and she spent three years conscious, blind and helpless. My brothers and sisters recited prayers over her prison, to plant the seed of faith in the soil I had weeded. I hid the truth from Incendia and became her mentor, setting her on a path of service to His will. And that was how Incendia, the offspring of a felonious heretic, became His vengeful hand striking down enemies of the Imperium. At the cost of the evil I had done."

traits.locale_text: «Saboteé la criocámara de Incendia y pasó tres años consciente, ciega e indefensa. Mis hermanos y hermanas oraron sobre su prisión para plantar la semilla de la fe en el suelo que yo había desherbado. Le oculté la verdad a Incendia y me convertí en su mentor, encaminándola por el camino del servicio a Su voluntad, y así fue como Incendia, hija de un hereje criminal, se convirtió en Su mano vengativa contra los enemigos del Imperium. A costa del mal que yo había hecho».

languages.text: "Ich habe Incendias Cryo-Grab sabotiert, und sie hat drei Jahre lang bei Bewusstsein darin verbracht, blind und hilflos. Meine Brüder und Schwester haben Gebete über ihrem Gefängnis gesprochen, um die Saat des Glaubens in der Erde einzupflanzen, die ich vom Unkraut befreit hatte. Ich habe die Wahrheit vor Incendia verborgen und bin zu ihrem Mentor geworden. Haben sie auf einen Pfad des Diensts an seinem Willen geführt. Und so wurde aus Incendia, der Nachfahrin einer verbrecherischen Ketzerin, seine rachsüchtige Hand, die Feinde des Imperiums niederstreckt. Auf Kosten des Bösen, das ich gewirkt hatte."
languages.original_text: "I sabotaged Incendia's cryo-vault, and she spent three years conscious, blind and helpless. My brothers and sisters recited prayers over her prison, to plant the seed of faith in the soil I had weeded. I hid the truth from Incendia and became her mentor, setting her on a path of service to His will. And that was how Incendia, the offspring of a felonious heretic, became His vengeful hand striking down enemies of the Imperium. At the cost of the evil I had done."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Incendias Cryo-Grab sabotiert, und sie hat drei Jahre lang bei Bewusstsein darin verbracht, blind und hilflos. Meine Brüder und Schwester haben Gebete über ihrem Gefängnis gesprochen, um die Saat des Glaubens in der Erde einzupflanzen, die ich vom Unkraut befreit hatte. Ich habe die Wahrheit vor Incendia verborgen und bin zu ihrem Mentor geworden. Haben sie auf einen Pfad des Diensts an seinem Willen geführt. Und so wurde aus Incendia, der Nachfahrin einer verbrecherischen Ketzerin, seine rachsüchtige Hand, die Feinde des Imperiums niederstreckt. Auf Kosten des Bösen, das ich gewirkt hatte."

languages.text: « J'ai saboté la chambre cryogénique d'Incendia et elle est restée trois ans dans un état de semi-conscience, aveugle et impuissante. Pendant ces trois années, mes frères et sœurs n'ont cessé de réciter des prières autour d'elle pour planter la graine de la foi dans ce sol que j'avais débarrassé des mauvaises herbes. J'ai caché la vérité à Incendia et je suis devenu son mentor, afin de faire d'elle une véritable fidèle au service de la volonté de l'Empereur. C'est ainsi qu'Incendia, descendante d'une hérétique félonne, est devenue Sa main vengeresse et un véritable fléau pour les ennemis de l'Imperium... au prix des atrocités que j'ai commises. »
languages.original_text: "I sabotaged Incendia's cryo-vault, and she spent three years conscious, blind and helpless. My brothers and sisters recited prayers over her prison, to plant the seed of faith in the soil I had weeded. I hid the truth from Incendia and became her mentor, setting her on a path of service to His will. And that was how Incendia, the offspring of a felonious heretic, became His vengeful hand striking down enemies of the Imperium. At the cost of the evil I had done."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai saboté la chambre cryogénique d'Incendia et elle est restée trois ans dans un état de semi-conscience, aveugle et impuissante. Pendant ces trois années, mes frères et sœurs n'ont cessé de réciter des prières autour d'elle pour planter la graine de la foi dans ce sol que j'avais débarrassé des mauvaises herbes. J'ai caché la vérité à Incendia et je suis devenu son mentor, afin de faire d'elle une véritable fidèle au service de la volonté de l'Empereur. C'est ainsi qu'Incendia, descendante d'une hérétique félonne, est devenue Sa main vengeresse et un véritable fléau pour les ennemis de l'Imperium... au prix des atrocités que j'ai commises. »

languages.text: "İncendia'nın kriyomahzenini sabote ettim ve sonraki üç yılı bilinci açık, kör ve çaresiz bir şekilde geçirdi. Kardeşlerim, yabani otlardan temizlediğim toprağa inanç tohumları ekmek adına, hapishanesine dualar okudu. Gerçeği İncendia'dan gizledim ve O'nun hizmetinde bir yol tutturması için yönderi oldum. Ve o cani kâfirin soyundan gelen İncendia, bu şekilde O'nun gazap dolu yumruğuna dönüştü, bu şekilde İmparatorluk'un düşmanlarını avlamaya başladı. Yaptığım kötülük bunun bedeliydi."
languages.original_text: "I sabotaged Incendia's cryo-vault, and she spent three years conscious, blind and helpless. My brothers and sisters recited prayers over her prison, to plant the seed of faith in the soil I had weeded. I hid the truth from Incendia and became her mentor, setting her on a path of service to His will. And that was how Incendia, the offspring of a felonious heretic, became His vengeful hand striking down enemies of the Imperium. At the cost of the evil I had done."
